frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, initializing it with the user's Internet Identity or anonymously, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including stock items, sales, and user profiles, with shared cache configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using OKLCH colors, and declares reusable component utility classes for gradients, cards, buttons, and tables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with TanStack Query's QueryClientProvider and a custom InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: Static About Us page displaying the store's hero section, origin story, and a grid of core values (Natural, Compassion, Quality, Community) with icons and styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard landing page that renders three navigation cards linking to Stock, Customers, and Sales Reports sections of the admin panel.

frontend/src/pages/EnquiryManagement.tsx: Admin page that reads customer enquiries from localStorage and displays them in two tabs: all enquiries and today's enquiries.

frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Admin profile settings page that loads and saves the current user's display name via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/RevenuePage.tsx: Admin page that wraps the RevenueOverview component with a header and a back-to-dashboard link.
frontend/src/pages/SalesPage.tsx: Admin page that wraps the TodaysSalesPanel component with a header and a back-to-dashboard link.
